lead_paragraph: Chipotle has plans to expand its burrito giveaway, part of its campaign to persuade people that its food is safe.

headline.print_headline: Chipotle Plans to Expand Burrito Giveaway Campaign
headline.main: Chipotle Plans to Expand Burrito Giveaway Campaign

snippet: Chipotle has plans to expand its burrito giveaway, part of its campaign to persuade people that its food is safe.
abstract: Chipotle will expand its burrito giveaway program to bring back customers after E coli outbreak caused decline in business.
